sources.title: Hidden Homicide
sources.description: Title: Hidden Homicide Summary: A man wakes up in a strange location with a gun in his hand and a dead body, not knowing how the whole thing happened. He doesn't remember anything about the whole scenario. Directed by: Anthony Young Actors: Griffith Jones, Patricia Laffan, James Kenney Production Company: Bill and Michael Luckwell Ltd. Release Date: 25 February 1959 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A man wakes up in a strange location with a gun in his hand and a dead body, not knowing how the whole thing happened. He doesn't remember anything about the whole scenario.

metadata.Plot: A man wakes up in a strange location with a gun in his hand and a dead body, not knowing how the whole thing happened. He doesn't remember anything about the whole scenario.
metadata.Writer: Paul Capon, Bill Luckwell, Anthony Young
